results.title: Why Did 488 Golden Retrievers Gather in Scotland?

results.abstract: Henry Choate, an 18-year-old Black man, was hanged outside the Maury County Courthouse in Tennessee in 1927 after he was falsely accused of attacking a white girl.

media.caption: Jason Aldean filmed a video for his song “Try That in a Small Town” at the Maury County Courthouse in Columbia, Tenn., where a Black man, Henry Choate, 18, was lynched by a white mob in 1927.
